## ⚠️ PULL REQUESTS NOT ACCEPTED

**This repository does not accept contributions.**

This is a **proprietary, source-visible codebase** made available for inspection only. 
It is **NOT open source**.

### What this means:
- ✅ You may view the code for security review, auditing, or educational purposes
- ❌ You may NOT submit pull requests, modifications, or contributions
- ❌ You may NOT fork, copy, or redistribute any portion of this code
- ❌ You may NOT use this code in your own projects or products

### This is not open source software
The availability of source code does NOT grant permission to use, modify, or 
distribute this software. All rights are reserved.

See [LICENSE](../LICENSE) for complete terms.

---

**Please close this pull request immediately.**

If you believe you have found a security vulnerability, please report it responsibly 
via the [SECURITY.md](../SECURITY.md) reporting process instead of submitting a PR.
